name: Db close
warnings: Using an invalid handle will crash your server! Get a valid handle by using db_open. But it's protected against NULL references.
description: Closes an SQLite database that was opened with db_open.

params_body.name: DB:db
params_body.description: The handle of the database connection to close (returned by db_open).

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. May mean that the database handle specified is not open.
